类型: Color: Glow Moon Tiny Message in a Bottle with Black Gift Box
评论详情: First the good: this thing is very cute and my girlfriend loves it. The seller is very responsive and works fast on exchanges, the first one arrived broken and the sent the replacement before I even sent the broken one back!  The bad: they ship this fragile little glass bottle with absolutely zero packing material. The envelope they sent the replacement in wasn't even a padded envelope! Also, some of the pictures make it look like this is a snow globe type thing with the glitter floating around in the bottle. It is not, the glitter is just in the bottom. You can get some of it to coat the bottle by gently rolling it, but its nothing like the pictures.  Overall, it is a great gift, just be prepared to have to send the first one back, unless they learn to put some packing material in the box.

My husband and I decided we want to become beekeepers and we have been studying and researching and prepping our gear in preparation for "bee day."  I became super excited when I saw this adorable bee in a bottle but I mistook it for a craft. It is my fault, there is nothing in the description that says you make it yourself (it is however a handmade craft), but you know sometimes when you see something you make a decision about it and then there's no convincing your brain otherwise....  We both really like it, it is cute and colorful and it is motivating just having it around, but it is tiny. It looks small in the pictures and video, but even smaller in person. Let me start by saying I love bees and my family loves bees! I was predisposed to love this little item! The bee is a little bit cute, I guess, but not nearly as cute as the image shown by the manufacturer, partly because the glitter is not as pictured in the sales pitch and partly because my bee is slightly unbalanced. You definitely want to look at the images posted by reviewers rather than by the maker for a more realistic view of the contents in the glass. In my second image, the bee bottle is on top of the nice box it comes in and shows the teeny "card" it comes with. Anyway, if this item had been maybe $10 I would have been happy. $15 might have been satisfied. But at the current price, wow. No. Just not worth it for this tiny trinket, imo.

类型: Color: Glow Moon Tiny Message in a Bottle with Black Gift Box
评论详情: It takes a little bit to scroll down and really see the size of this in their description.  When they describe it as TINY, they aren't lying.  My pictures are it in my hand to show you the true size.  I also cannot get the confetti to stay around the bottle (like their pictures), so really you just have glow in the dark confetti on the bottom and maybe a little bit around the edge.  I don't like shaking it (like the directions) because I'm afraid the astronaut will break.  I will say the astronaut/moon/sign seem to be high quality and I don't see it easily breaking as it does come in a giftable box as they describe.For the price and the glitter not really looking like advertised, I took off one star because I don't think the value is there.However, the reason I bought this is because this is what my son and mom say to each other every time they talk so the meaning is very special...also because it is so small, it is something she could put anywhere to remind her of her grandson.  If that is what you are looking for, then this is perfect but I just can't get over the price of something this small.
